Wheeljack-X::

Jackie could have been in the next solar system and be bothered more 
about a Predacon in the base, for all appearences.  He relaxes 
against the wall, seceretly keeping a very close eye on Cygnar.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> He looks at Nighlight as she comes into the room. 
> 
> "Just a little meeting, Nightlight. This is one of Galvatron's 
troops. He is here to discuss some things."
